title: Every Post Is About Clash, Rito Plz
body:
I click the Riot link to learn about Clash, but I just get some image of turning a phone sideways (I'm on a desktop PC ffs).
I try in client to learn more, but it says I need to do ranked placements first, I only ARAM. 

I guess this is (yet another) Riot/LoL event IDGAF about (like almost every other).
I skip every mission that can't be completed on the Howling Abyss, Riot's attitude is so bizarre.
Like, they just talked about support for ARAM in the first time for ages (in the patch notes), but they still treat ARAM only players like trash.
I get that SR is the main focus of the game, but I hate farming in a PvP game. If I want to farm, I'll go play Path of Exile or Diablo.

I'm so sick of ward skins from hextech chests, when I can't place wards in ARAM. Instant disenchant  into OE (such a pitiful amount too).

I don't care about missions I can't complete in ARAM (dragon/wards/etc), I play games for fun, not as a chore.
Rewards aren't going to make me play what I don't find fun.

I did open a chest to get Pulsefire {{champion:81}} skin (not shard) today, so that's kinda cool (not that I play Ez), but this is about the first positive thing I can say about the game in a long time, and all it was... is luck.
